scripts.watch: concurrently -k -t HH:mm -p "[{index} - {time}]" "npm run watch:player" "npm run watch:remote"
scripts.build: npm run build:player && npm run build:remote
scripts.build:player: cross-env NODE_ENV=production browserify src/player.jsx -p [ css-modulesify --before postcss-nested -o static/css/player.css ] -t babelify --extension=jsx | uglifyjs > static/js/player.js
scripts.build:remote: cross-env NODE_ENV=production browserify src/remote.jsx -p [ css-modulesify --before postcss-nested -o static/css/remote.css ] -t babelify --extension=jsx | uglifyjs > static/js/remote.js
scripts.watch:player: watchify src/player.jsx -o static/js/player.js -p [ css-modulesify --before postcss-nested -o static/css/player.css ] -t babelify --extension=jsx -d -v
scripts.watch:remote: watchify src/remote.jsx -o static/js/remote.js -p [ css-modulesify --before postcss-nested -o static/css/remote.css ] -t babelify --extension=jsx -d -v
